bs-socialprofile-entityprofile-header:
{{notranslate}}
Headline for a "profile" entry. Must link to owners user page [[$6|$6]]
* $1 - Username of the owner of this entry
* $2 - Real name of the owner of this entry
* $3 - Main part of title of the source page, this entry is saved in as json data
* $4 - Namespace number of the page, this entry is saved in as json data
* $5 - Namespace name of the page, this entry is saved in as json data
* $6 - Full title text of the owners user page
bs-socialprofile-entityaction-changeimag: Short label for a button, that lets the user open a dialog to change the users profile image
bs-social-entityaction-editprofilefields: Short label for a button, that lets the user change the users profile data
bs-socialprofile-entity-fatalstatus-save: Internal error message when an invalid 'User' object was given when saving
bs-social-profile-field-name:
Label for field "name" in the users profile.
{{Identical|Name}}
bs-social-profile-field-email:
Label for field "email" in the users profile.
{{Identical|E-Mail}}
bs-social-profile-field-title:
Label for field "title" in the users profile.
{{Identical|Title}}
bs-social-profile-field-department:
Label for field "department" in the users profile.
{{Identical|Department}}
bs-social-profile-field-function:
Label for field "function" in the users profile.
{{Identical|Function}}
bs-social-profile-field-location:
Label for field "location" in the users profile.
{{Identical|Location}}
bs-social-profile-field-phone:
Label for field "phone" in the users profile.
{{Identical|Telephone}}
bs-social-profile-field-validate-no-inte:
Error message, that the given value was not numeric
* $1 - Label for the given value
bs-socialprofile-special-profiles-headin:
Special page header for [[Special:Socialprofiles]] special page.
{{Identical|Profile}}
bs-social-profile-infoshowemail: Label for the option checkbox in [[Special:Preferences]] that lets users toggle the display of their email address in their profile
socialprofiles:
Special page name for [[Special:Socialprofiles]] special page.
{{Identical|Profile}}
bs-socialprofile-switch-classicprofile-l: Short label for button that switches to the classic profile.
bs-socialprofile-switch-modernprofile-la:
Short label for button that switches to the modern profile.
{{Identical|Modern profile}}
bs-socialprofile-switch-classicprofile-t:
Tooltip text for button that switches to the Â´classic profile.
{{Identical|Switch to classic profile}}
bs-socialprofile-switch-modernprofile-to:
Tooltip text for button that switches to the modern profile.
{{Identical|Switch to modern profile}}
bs-socialprofile-tag-socialentityprofile: Description of the socialentityprofile tag shown in the VisualEditor tag inspector
bs-socialprofile-ve-socialentityprofilei: Title for the socialentityprofile tag VisualEditor inspector
bs-socialprofile-tag-socialentityprofile:
Label for the option "list" of the "rendertype" attribute input field in the VisualEditor tag inspector
{{identical|List}}
Label for the option "short" of the "rendertype" attribute input field in the VisualEditor tag inspector

Label for the option "default" of the "rendertype" attribute input field in the VisualEditor tag inspector
{{identical|Default}}

Label for the option "page" of the "rendertype" attribute input field in the VisualEditor tag inspector
{{identical|Page}}
bs-socialprofile-droplet-name: Title of droplet for tag SocialProfile
bs-socialprofile-droplet-description: Description of droplet for tag SocialProfile
